title: Bug with automatic rechunking on reshape

labels.name: needs attention
labels.description: It's been a while since this was pushed on. Needs attention from the owner or a maintainer.

labels.name: needs triage
labels.description: Needs a response from a contributor

body:
From https://github.com/pydata/xarray/issues/8345

```python
import dask.array
array = dask.array.ones(shape=(2, 1000, 100, 4800), chunks=(2, 1000, 100, 83))
with dask.config.set({'array.slicing.split_large_chunks': True}):
    array = array.reshape(2, 1000, 100, 4, 1200)
array
```
